trans-unit.source: A simple script to parse a rss and download its mp3 files
trans-unit.target: Un simple script para analizar un rss y descargar sus archivos mp3

trans-unit.source: Hmm… okay. How do I install / use this thing?
trans-unit.target: Hmm… okay. How do I install / use this thing?

trans-unit.source: It’s not made to track new podcast releases nor to respect all the podcast formats that exist. I made this because I wanted to get all the files of a podcast I love, and I published it here just because.
trans-unit.target: It’s not made to track new podcast releases nor to respect all the podcast formats that exist. I made this because I wanted to get all the files of a podcast I love, and I published it here just because.

trans-unit.source: This is a really simple script you can use to download all the files linked in an RSS podcast.
trans-unit.target: Este es un guión muy simple que puedes usar para descargar todos los archivos enlazados en un podcast RSS.
